GSP33brssbh2u:4: prathame 'dhyāye sarvajñaḥ sarveśvaraḥ jagata utpattikāraṇaṃ, mṛtsuvarṇādaya iva ghaṭarucakādīnām /
GSP33brssbh2u:5: utpannasya jagato niyantṛtvena stithikāraṇaṃ, māyāvīva māyāyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:6: prasāritasya ca jagataḥ punaḥ svātmanyevopasaṃhārakāraṇaṃ, avaniriva caturvidhasya bhūtagrāmasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:7: sa eva ca sarveṣāṃ na ātmetyetadvedāntavākyasamanvayapratipādanena pratipāditam /
GSP33brssbh2u:11: prativedāntaṃ ca sṛṣṭyādiprakriyāyā avigītatvamisyarthajātasya pratipādanāya dvitīyo 'dhyāya ārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:14: yaduktaṃ brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti, tadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:16: smṛtiśca tantrākhyā paramarṣipraṇītā śiṣṭaparigṛhītā anyāśca tadanusīriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:18: tāsu hyacetanaṃ pradhānaṃ svatantraṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamupanibadhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:29: kathaṃ punarīkṣatyādibhyo hetubhyo brahmaiva sarvajñaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamityavadhāritaḥ śrutyarthaḥ smṛtyanavakāśadoṣaprasaṅgena punarākṣipyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:31: paratantraprajñāstu prāyeṇa janāḥ svātantryeṇa śrutyarthamavadhārayitumaśaknuvantaḥ prakhyātapraṇetṛkāsu smṛtiṣvavalamberan /
GSP33brssbh2u:33: asmatkṛte ca vyākhyāne na viśvasyurbahumānātsmṛtīnāṃ praṇetṛṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:35: śrutiśca bhavati- 'ṛṣiṃ prasūtaṃ kapilaṃ yastamagre jñānairbibharti jāyamānaṃ ca paśyet' (śve. 5.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:38: tasmādapi smṛtibalena vedāntā vyākhyeyā iti punarākṣepaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:42_0: tā udāhariṣyāmaḥ - 'yattatsūkṣmamavijñeyam' iti paraṃ brahma prakṛtya 'sa hyantarātmā
GSP33brssbh2u:42_1: bhūtānāṃ kṣetrajñaśceti kathyate' iti coktvā 'tasmādavyaktamutpannaṃ triguṇaṃ dvijasattama' ityāha /
GSP33brssbh2u:45: sa sargakāle ca karoti sarvaṃ saṃhārakāle ca tadatti bhūyaḥ' iti purāṇe /
GSP33brssbh2u:46: bhagavadgītāsu ca- 'ahaṃ kṛtsnasya jagataḥ prabhavaḥ pralayastathā' (bha.gī. 7.6) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:47: paramātmānameva ca prakṛtyāpastamabaḥ paṭhati- 'tasmātkāyāḥ prabhavanti sarve sa mūlaṃ śāśvatikaḥ sa nityaḥ (dha.sū. 1.8.23.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:51: vipratipattau ca smṛtīnāmavaśyakartavye 'nyataraparigrahe 'nyataraparityāge ca śrutyanusāriṇyaḥ smṛtayaḥ pramāṇamanapekṣyā itarāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:52: taduktaṃ pramāṇalakṣaṇe- 'virodhe tvanapekṣaṃ syādasti hyanumānam' (jai.sū. 1.3.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:53: nacātīndriyānarthañśrutimantareṇa kaścidupalabhata iti śakyaṃ saṃbhāvayituṃ nimittābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:59: tataśca pūrvasiddhāyāścodanāyā artho na paścimasiddhapuruṣavacanavaśenātiśaṅkituṃ śakyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:60: siddhavyapāśrayakalpanāyāmapi bahutvātsiddhānāṃ pradraśitena prakāreṇa smṛtivipratipattau satyāṃ na śrutivyapāśrayādanyannirṇayakāraṇamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:63: tasmāttasyāpi smṛtivipratipattyupanyāsena smṛtyanusārāviṣayavivecanena ca sanmārge prajñā saṃgrahaṇīyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:64: yā tu śrutiḥ kapilasya jñānātiśayaṃ pradarśayantī pradarśitā na tayā śrutiviruddhamapi kāpilaṃ mataṃ śraddhātuṃ śakyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:66: anyasya ca kapilasya sagaraputrāṇāṃ pratapturvāsudevanāmnaḥ smaraṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:68: bhavati cānyā manormāhātmyaṃ prakhyāpayantī śrutiḥ - 'yadvai kiñca manuravadattadbheṣajam' (tai.saṃ 2.2.10.2) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:71: ' (12.11) iti sarvātmatvadarśanaṃ praśaṃsatā kāpilaṃ mataṃ nindyata iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:73_0: mahābhārate 'pi ca 'bahavaḥ puruṣā brahmannutāho eka eva tu' iti vicārya 'bahavaḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:75: ' ityupakramya 'mamāntarātmā tava ca ye cānye dehasaṃsthitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:81: tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ ekatvamanupaśyataḥ' (ī. 7) ityevaṃvidhā /
GSP33brssbh2u:82: ataśca siddhamātmabhedakalpanayāpi kapilasya tantraṃ vedaviruddhaṃ vedānusārimanuvacanaviruddhaṃ ca,
GSP33brssbh2u:84: vedasya hi nirapekṣaṃ svārthe prāmāṇyaṃ raveriva rūpaviṣaye /
GSP33brssbh2u:85: puruṣavacasāṃ tu mūlāntarāpekṣaṃ vaktusmṛtivyavahitaṃ ceti viprakarṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:105: pradhānāditarāṇi yāni pradhānapariṇāmatvaṃ na samṛtau kalpitāni mahadādīni na tāni vede loke vopalabhyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:108: yadapi kvacittatparamiva śravaṇamavabhāsate tadapyatatparaṃ vyākhyātam 'ānumānikamapyekeṣām' (bra. 1.4.1) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh2u:120: samyagdarśanābhyupāyo hi yogo vede vihitaḥ 'śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:122: ityādinā cāsanādikalpanāpuraḥsaraṃ bahuprapañcaṃ yogavidhānaṃ śvetāśvataropaniṣadi dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:123: liṅgāni ca vaidikāni yogaviṣayāṇi sahasraśa upalabhyante 'tāṃ yogamiti manyante sthirāmindriyadhāraṇām' (kā. 2.6.18)
GSP33brssbh2u:124: iti 'vidyāmetāṃ yogavidhiṃ ca kṛtsnam (kā. 2.6.18) iti caivamādīni /
GSP33brssbh2u:125: yogaśāstre 'pi 'atha tattvadarśanopāyo yogaḥ' iti samyagdarśanābhyupāyatvenaiva yogoṅgīkriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:129: satīṣvapyadhyātmaviṣayāsu bahvīṣu smṛtiṣu sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoreva nirākaraṇe yatnaḥ kṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:133: 'tatkāraṇaṃ sāṃkhyayogābhipannaṃ jñātvā devaṃ mucyate sarvapāśaiḥ' (śvaṃ. 6.13) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:134: nirākaraṇaṃ tu na sāṃkhyajñānena vedanirapekṣeṇa yogamārgeṇa vā niḥśreyasamadhigamyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:135: śrutirhi vaidikādātmaikatvavijñānādanyanniḥśreyasasādhanaṃ vārayati 'tameva viditvātimṛtyumeti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya' (śvaṃ. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:136: dvaitino hi te sāṃkhyā yogāśca nātmaikatvadarśinaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:138: vaidikameva tatra jñānaṃ dhyānaṃ ca sāṃkhyayogaśabdābhyāmabhilapyate pratyāsatterityavagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:139: yena tvaṃśena na virudhyete teneṣṭameva sāṃkhyayogasmṛtyoḥ sāvakāśatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:146: tattvajñānaṃ tu vedāntavākyebhya eva bhavati 'nāvedavinmanute taṃ bṛhantam' (tai. brā. 3.12.9.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:155: na vilakṣaṇatvād asya tathātvaṃ ca śabdāt | BBs_2,1.4 |
GSP33brssbh2u:156: brahmāsya jagato nimittakāraṇaṃ prakṛtiścetyasya pakṣasyākṣepaḥ smṛtinimittaḥ parihṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:159: nanu dharma iva brahmaṇyanapekṣa āgamo bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:160: bhavedayamavaṣṭambho yadi pramāṇāntarānavagāhya āgamamātraprameyo 'yamarthaḥ syādanuṣṭheyarūpa iva dharmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:162: pariniṣpanne ca vastuni pramāṇāntarāṇāmastyavakāśo yathā pṛthivyādiṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:167: anubhavāvasānaṃ ca brahmavijñānamavidyāyā nivartakaṃ mokṣasādhanaṃ ca dṛṣṭaphalatayeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:168: śrutirapi- 'śrotavyo mantavyaḥ' iti śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhatī tarkamapyatrādartavyaṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:170: yaduktaṃ cetanaṃ brahma jagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:174: idaṃ hi brahmakāryatvenābhipreyamāṇaṃ jagat brahmavilakṣaṇamacetanamaśuddhaṃ ca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:175: brahma ca jagadvilakṣaṇaṃ cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ ca śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:177: nahi rucakādayo vikārā mṛtprakṛtikā bhavanti śarāvādayo vā suvarṇaprakṛtikāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:178: mṛdaiva tu mṛdānvitā vikārāḥ kriyante suvarṇena ca suvarṇānvitāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:179: tathedamapi jagadacetanaṃ sukhaduḥkhamohānvitaṃ sadacetanasyaiva sukhaduḥkhamohātmakasya kāraṇasya kāryaṃ bhavitumarhatīti na vilakṣaṇasya brahmaṇaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:188: yo hyekasya cetanasya parigraho buddhyādicetanabhāgaḥ sa evānyasya cetanasyopakaroti natu svayameva cetanaścetanāntarasyopakarotyapakaroti vā /
GSP33brssbh2u:194: yo 'pi kaścidācakṣīta śrutvā jagataścetanaprakṛtikatāṃ tadbalenaiva samastaṃ jagaccetanamavagamayiṣyāmi /
GSP33brssbh2u:197: yathā spaṣṭacaitanyānāmapyātmanāṃ svāpamūrcchādyavasthāsu caitanyaṃ na vibhāvyata evaṃ kāṣṭhaloṣṭādīnāmapi caitanyaṃ na vibhāvayiṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:198: etasmādeva ca vibhāvitāvibhāvitatvakṛtādviśeṣādrūpādibhāvābhāvābhyāṃ ca kāryakāraṇānāmātmanāṃ ca cetanatvāviśeṣe 'pi guṇapradhānabhāvo na virotsyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:199: yathā ca pārthivatvāviśeṣe 'pi māṃsasūpaudanādīnāṃ pratyātmavartino viśeṣātparasparopakāritvaṃ bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:203: nacetaradapi vilakṣaṇatvaṃ parihartuṃ śakyata ityāha- tathātvaṃ ca śabdāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:204: anavagamyamānamevaṃ hīdaṃ loke samastasya vastunaścetanatvaṃ cetanaprakṛtikatvaśravaṇācchabdaśaraṇatayā kevalayotprekṣata,
GSP33brssbh2u:221: indriyaviṣayāpi 'te heme prāṇā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānā brahma jagmuḥ' (bṛ. 6.1.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:227: na khalu mṛdabravīdityevañjātīyakayā śrutyā bhūtendriyāṇāṃ cetanatvamāśaṅkanīyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:229: mṛdādyabhimāninyo vāgādyabhimāninyaśca cetanā devatā vadanasaṃvadanādiṣu cetanociteṣu vyavahāreṣu vyapadiśyante na bhūtendriyamātram /
GSP33brssbh2u:232: viśeṣo hi bhoktṛṇāṃ bhūtendriyāṇāṃ ca cetanācetanapravibhāgalakṣaṇaḥ prāgabhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:234: apica kauṣītakinaḥ prāṇasaṃvāde karaṇamātrāśaṅkāvinivṛttaye 'dhiṣṭhātṛcetanaparigrahāya devatāśabdena viśiṣanti- 'etā ha vai devatā ahaṃśreyase vivadamānāḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:235: 'tā vā etāḥ sarvā devatāḥ prāṇe niḥśreyasaṃ viditvā' (2.14) iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:238: ityevamādikā ca śrutiḥ karaṇeṣvanugrāhikāṃ devatāmanugatāṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:239: prāṇasaṃvādavākyaśeṣe ca 'te ha prāṇāḥ prajāpatiṃ pitarametyocuḥ' (chā. 5.1.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:244: 'tatteja aikṣata' ityapi parasyā eva devatāyā adhiṣṭātryāḥ svavikāreṣvanugatāyā iyamīkṣā vyapadiśyata iti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:257: dṛśyate hi loke cetanatvena prasiddhebhyaḥ puruṣādibhyo vilakṣaṇānāṃ keśanakhādīnāmutpattiḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:261: ucyate- evamapi kiñcidacetanaṃ cetanasyāyatanabhāvamupagacchati kiñcinnetyastyeva vailakṣaṇyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:262: mahāṃścāyaṃ pāriṇāmikaḥ svabhāvaviprakarṣaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādīnāṃ ca svarūpādibhedāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:265: athocyetāsti kaścitpārthivatvādisvabhāvaḥ puruṣādīnāṃ keśanakhādiṣvanuvartamāno gomayādīnāṃ vṛścikādiṣviti /
GSP33brssbh2u:267: vilakṣaṇatvena ca kāraṇena brahmaprakṛtitvaṃ jagato dūṣayatā kimaśeṣasya brahmasvabhāvasyānanuvartanaṃ vilakṣaṇatvamabhipreyata uta yasya kasyacidasya caitanyasyeti vaktavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:271: dṛśyate hi sattālakṣaṇo brahmasvabhāva ākāśādiṣvanuvartamāna ityuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:273: kiṃ hi yaccaitanyenānanvitaṃ tadabrahmaprakṛtikaṃ dṛṣṭamiti brahmavādinaṃ pratyudāhriyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:282: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'naiṣā tarkeṇa matirāpaneyā proktānyenaiva sujñānāya preṣṭha' (kā. 1.2.9) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:285: iti caite ṛcau siddhānāmapīśvarāṇāṃ durbodhatāṃ jagatkāraṇasya darśayataḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:286: smṛtirapi bhavati- 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:288: 'na me viduḥ suragaṇāḥ prabhavaṃ na maharṣayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:289: ahamādirhi devānāṃ maharṣīṇāṃ ca sarvaśaḥ' (gī. 10.2) iti caivañjātīyakā /
GSP33brssbh2u:290: yadapi śravaṇavyatirekeṇa mananaṃ vidadhacchabda eva tarkamapyādartavyaṃ darśayatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:297_1: vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ ca iti cetanācetanavibhāgaśravaṇaṃ vibhāvanāvibhāvanābhyāṃ caitanyasya
GSP33brssbh2u:300: paramakāraṇasya hyatra samastajagadātmanā samavasthānaṃ śrāvyate 'vijñānaṃ cāvijñānaṃ cābhavat' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:303: pratyuktatvāttu vilakṣaṇatvasya yathāśrutyaiva kāraṇaṃ grahītavyaṃ bhavati // 6 //
GSP33brssbh2u:306: eṣā vedāntaśāstrajanyā matistarkeṇa svamatyūhamātreṇāpaneyā bādhārhā na /
GSP33brssbh2u:308: kintu anyena nipuṇenācāryeṇa proktaprabodhitā satī sujñānāya sākṣātkārāya bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:310: iyaṃ visṛṣṭirākāśādisṛṣṭiḥ kutaḥ kasmājjātā kasmācca sthitiṃ prāptetyaddhā tattvena ko veda, na ko 'pi /
GSP33brssbh2u:314: asad iti cen na pratiṣedhamātratvāt | BBs_2,1.7 |
GSP33brssbh2u:315: yadi cetanaṃ śuddhaṃ śabdavihīnaṃ ca brahma tadviparūtasyācetanasyāśuddhasya śabdādimataśca kāryasya kāraṇamiṣyetāsattarhi kāryaṃ prāgutpatteriti prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:320: nahyayaṃ pratiṣedhaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sattvaṃ kāryasya pratiṣeddhuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:322: yathaiva hīdānāmapīdaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā sadevaṃ prāgutpatterapīti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:329: natu śabdādimatkāryaṃ kāraṇātmanā hīnaṃ prāgutpatteridānīṃ vāsti /
GSP33brssbh2u:334_1: brahmakāraṇamabhyupagamyeta tadapītau pralaye pratisaṃsṛjyamānaṃ kāryaṃ kāraṇāvibhāgamāpadyamānaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:334_2: kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa dūṣayedityapītau kāraṇasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāryasyevāśuddhyādirūpaprasaṅgātsarvajñaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:336: apica bhoktṛṇāṃ pareṇa brahmaṇāvibhāgaṃ gatānāṃ karmādinimittapralaye 'pi punarutpattāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ muktānāmapi punaruttattiprasaṅgādasamañjasam /
GSP33brssbh2u:344: yattāvadabhihitaṃ kāraṇamapigacchatkāryaṃ kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa dūṣayediti, tadadūṣaṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:347: santi hi dṛṣṭāntā yathā kāraṇamapigacchatkāryaṃ kāraṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa na dūṣayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:348: tadyathā śarāvādayo mṛtprakṛtikā vikārā vibhāgāvasthāyāmuccāvacamadhyamaprabhedāḥ santaḥ punaḥ prakṛtimapigacchanto na tāmātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:349: rucakādayaśca suvarṇavikārā apītau na suvarṇamātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:350: pṛthivīvikāraścaturvidho bhūtagrāmo na pṛthivīmapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa saṃsṛjati /
GSP33brssbh2u:352: apītireva hi na saṃbhavedyadi kāraṇe kāryaṃ svadharmeṇaivāvatiṣṭheta /
GSP33brssbh2u:353: ananyatve 'pi kāryakāraṇayoḥ kāryasya kāraṇātmatvaṃ natu kāraṇasya kāryātmatvaṃ 'ārambhaṇaśabdādibhyaḥ' iti vakṣyāmaḥ (bra.sū. 2.1.14) /
GSP33brssbh2u:354: atyalpaṃ cedamucyate kāryamapītāvātmīyena dharmeṇa kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjediti /
GSP33brssbh2u:360: ityevamādyābhirhi śrutibhiraviśeṣeṇa triṣvapi kāleṣu kāryasya kāraṇānanyatvaṃ śrāvyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:361: tatra yaḥ parihāraḥ kāryasya taddharmāṇāṃ cāvidyādhyāropitatvānna taiḥ kāraṇaṃ saṃsṛjyata iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:363: asti cāyamaparo dṛṣṭānto yathā svayaṃ prasāritayā māyayā māyāvī triṣvapi kāleṣu na saṃspaśyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:365: evaṃ paramātmāpi saṃsāramāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:366: yathā ca svapnadṛgekaḥ svapnadarśanamāyayā na saṃspṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:370: atroktaṃ vedāntārthasaṃpradāyavidbhirācāryaiḥ - 'anādimāyayā supto yadā jīvaḥ prabudhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:372: tatra yaduktamapītau kāraṇasyāpi kāryasyeva sthaulyādidoṣaprasaṅga ityetadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:373: yatpunaretaduktaṃ samastasya vibhāgasyāvibhāgaprāpteḥ punarvibhāgenotpattau niyamakāraṇaṃ nopapadyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:376: yathāhi suṣuptisamādhyādāvapi satyāṃ svābhāvikyāmavibhāgaprāptau mithyājñānasyānapoditatvātpūrvavatpunaḥ prabodhe vibhāgo bhavatyevamihāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:377_0: śrutiścātra bhavati- 'imāḥ sarvāḥ prajāḥ sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyāmaha
GSP33brssbh2u:377_1: iti ta iha vyāghro vā siṃho vā vṛko vā varāho vā kīṭo vā pataṅgo vā daṃśo vā maśako
GSP33brssbh2u:378: yathā hyavibhāge 'pi paramātmani mithyājñānapratibaddho vibhāgavyavahāraḥ svapnavadavyāhataḥ sthito dṛśyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:382: yaḥ punarayamante 'paro vikalpa utprekṣito 'thedaṃ jagadapītāvapi vibhaktameva pareṇa brahmaṇāvatiṣṭheteti,
GSP33brssbh2u:389: iha suṣupteḥ prāk prabodhe yena jātyādinā vibhaktā bhavanti tadā punarutthānakāle tathaiva bhavantīti vibhāgoktiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:392: svapakṣe caite prativādinaḥ sādhāraṇā doṣāḥ prāduṣyuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:399_1: prākpralayātpratipuruṣaṃ ye niyatā bhedā na te tathaiva punarutpatau niyantuṃ śakyante kāraṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:402: ye nāpadyante teṣāṃ pradhānakāryatvaṃ na prāpnotītyevamete doṣāḥ sādhāraṇatvānnānyatarasminpakṣe codayitavyā bhavantītyadoṣatāmevaiṣāṃ draḍhayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:407: tarkāpratiṣṭhānād apy anyathānumeyam iti ced evam apy anirmokṣaprasaṅgaḥ | BBs_2,1.11 |
GSP33brssbh2u:412: tairapyutprekṣitāḥ santastato 'nyairābhāsyanta iti na pratiṣṭhitatvaṃ tarkāṇāṃ śakyamāśrayituṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:414: atha kasyacitprasiddhamāhātmyasya kapilasya cānyasya vā saṃmatastarkaḥ pratiṣṭhita ityāśrīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:418: nahi pratiṣṭhitastarka eva nāstīti śakyate vaktum /
GSP33brssbh2u:422: atītavartamānādhvasāmyena hyanāgate 'pyadhvani sukhaduḥkhaprāptiparihārāya pravartamāno loko dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:423: śrutyarthavipratipattau cārthābhāsanirākaraṇena samyagarthanirdhāraṇaṃ tarkeṇaiva vākyavṛttinirūpaṇarūpeṇa kriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:424: manurapi caivaṃ manyate- 'pratyakṣamanumānaṃ ca śāstraṃ ca vividhāgamam /
GSP33brssbh2u:432: nahi pūrvajo mūḍha āsīdityātmanāpi mūḍhena bhavitavyamiti kiñcidasti pramāṇam /
GSP33brssbh2u:433: tasmānna tarkāpratiṣṭhānaṃ doṣa iti cet, evamapyavimokṣaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:434: yadyapi kvacidviṣaye tarkasya pratiṣṭhitatvamupalakṣyate tathāpi prakṛte tāvadviṣaye prasajyata evāpratiṣṭhitatvadoṣādanirmokṣastarkasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:436: rūpādyabhāvāddhi nāyamarthaḥ pratyakṣagocaraḥ, liṅgādyabhāvācca nānumānādīnāmiti cāvocāma /
GSP33brssbh2u:440: loke tadviṣayaṃ jñānaṃ samyagjñānamityucyate yathāgniruṣṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:443: yaddhi kenacittārkikeṇedameva samyagjñānamiti pratipāditaṃ tadapareṇa vyutthāpyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:444: tenāpi pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tato 'pareṇa vyutthāpyata iti prasiddhaṃ loke /
GSP33brssbh2u:446: naca pradhānavādī tarkavidāmuttama iti sarvāstārkikaiḥ parigṛhīto yena tadīyaṃ mataṃ samyagjñānamiti pratipadyemahi /
GSP33brssbh2u:447: naca śakyante 'tītānāgatavartamānāstārkikā ekasmindeśe kāle ca samāhartuṃ yena tanmatirekarūpaikārthaviṣayā samyaṅmatiriti syāta /
GSP33brssbh2u:448: vedasya tu nityatve vijñānotpattihetutve ca sati vyavasthitārthaviṣayatvopapattestajjanitasya jñānasya samyaktvamatītānāgatavartamānaiḥ sarvairapi tārkikairapahnotumaśakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:451: ata āgamavaśenāgamānusāritarkavaśena ca cetanaṃ brahmajagataḥ kāraṇaṃ prakṛtiśceti sthitam // 11 //
GSP33brssbh2u:462: idānīmaṇvādivādavyapāśrayeṇāpi kaiścinmandamatibhirvedāntavākyeṣu punastarkanimitta ākṣepa āśaṅkyata ityataḥ pradhānamallanibarhaṇanyāyenātidiśati /
GSP33brssbh2u:463: parigṛhyanta iti parigrahāḥ na parigrahā aparigrahāḥ śiṣṭānāmaparigrahāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:465: tulyamātrāpi paramagambhīrasya jagatkāraṇasya tarkānavagāhyatvaṃ tarkasyāpratiṣṭhitatvamanyathānumāne 'pyavimokṣa āgamavirodhaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ nirākaraṇam // 12 //
GSP33brssbh2u:468: bhoktrāpatter avibhāgaś cet syāl lokavat | BBs_2,1.13 |
GSP33brssbh2u:470: yadyapi śrutiḥ pramāṇaṃ svaviṣaye bhavati tathāpi pramāṇāntareṇa viṣayāpahāre 'nyaparā bhavitumarti /
GSP33brssbh2u:475: kathaṃ punaḥ pramāṇāntaraprasiddhor'thaḥ śrutyā bādhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:476: atrocyate- prasiddho hyayaṃ bhoktṛbhogyavibhāgo loke bhoktā cetanaḥ śārīro bhogyāḥ śabdādayo viṣayā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:477: yathā bhoktā devadatto bhojya odana iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:478: tasya ca vibhāgasyābhāvaḥ prasajyeta yadi bhoktā bhogyabhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:484: upapadyata evāyamasmatpakṣe 'pi vibhāgaḥ evaṃ loke dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:485: tathāhi- samudrādudakātmano 'nanyatve 'pi tadvikārāṇāṃ phenavīcītaraṅgādīnāmitaretaravibhāga itaretarasaṃśleṣādilakṣaṇaśca vyavahāra upalabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:488: evamihāpi naca bhoktṛbhogyayoritaretarabhāvāpattiḥ, naca parasmādbrahmaṇo 'nyatvaṃ bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:500: abhyupagamya cemaṃ vyāvahārikaṃ bhoktṛbhogyalakṣaṇaṃ vibhāgaṃ syāllokavaditi parihāroṣa'bhihitaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:508_0: ekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya dṛṣṭāntāpekṣāyāmucyate- 'yathā somyaikena mṛtpiṇḍena
GSP33brssbh2u:508_1: sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ vijñātaṃ syādvācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ mṛttiketyeva satyam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:509: etaduktaṃ bhavati- ekena mṛtpiṇḍena paramārthato mṛdātmanā vijñātena sarvaṃ mṛnmayaṃ ghaṭaśarāvodañcanādikaṃ mṛdātmakatvāviśeṣādvijñātaṃ bhavet /
GSP33brssbh2u:510: yato vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ vācaiva kevalamastītyārabhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:515: tatra śrutādvācārambhaṇaśabdāddārṣṭāntike 'pi brahmavyatirekeṇa kāryajātasyābhāva iti gamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:516_1: bravīti- 'apāgādagneragnitvaṃ vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyaṃ trīṇi rūpāṇītyeva satyam'
GSP33brssbh2u:517: ārambhaṇaśabdādibhya ityādiśabdāt 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi' (chā. 6.8.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:527: nanvanekātmakaṃ brahma, yathā vṛkṣo 'nekaśākha evamanekaśaktipravṛttiyuktaṃ brahma /
GSP33brssbh2u:529: yathā vṛkṣa ityanekatvaṃ śākhā iti nānātvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:533: nānātvāṃśena tu karmakāṇḍāśrayau laukikavaidikavyavahārau setsyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:538: dārṣṭāntike 'pi 'aitadātmyamidaṃ sarvaṃ tatsatyam' iti ca paramakāraṇasyaivaikasya satyatvāvadhāraṇāt 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' iti ca śārīrasya brahmabhāvopadeśāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:539: svayaṃ prasiddhaṃ hyetaccharīrasya brahmātmatvamupadiśyate na yatnāntaraprasādhyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:540: ataścedaṃ śāstrīyaṃ brahmātmatvamavagamyamānaṃ svābhāvikasya śārīrātmatvasya bādhakaṃ saṃpadyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:542: bādhite ca śārīrātmatvasya tadāśrayaḥ samastaḥ svābhāviko vyavahāro bādhito bhavati yatprasiddhaye nānātvāṃśo 'paro brahmaṇaḥ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:545: ityādinā brahmātmatvadarśinaṃ prati samastasya kriyākārakaphalalakṣaṇasya vyavahārasyābhāvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:548: taskaradṛṣṭāntena cānṛtābhisaṃdhasya bandhanaṃ satyābhisaṃdhasya ca mokṣaṃ darśayannekatvamevaikaṃ pāramārthikaṃ darśayati (chā. 6.16) /
GSP33brssbh2u:550: ubhayasatyatāyāṃ hi kathaṃ vyavahāragocaro 'pi janturanṛtābhisaṃdha ityucyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:551: 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:565: vikārāneva tvahaṃ mametyavidyāyāmātmīyena bhāvena sarvo jantuḥ pratipadyate svābhāvikīṃ brahmātmatāṃ hitvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:567: yathā suptasya prākṛtasya janasya svapna uccāvacānbhāvānpaśyato niścitameva pratyakṣābhimataṃ vijñānaṃ bhavati prākprabodhāt,
GSP33brssbh2u:569: kathaṃ tvasatyena vedāntavākyena satyasya brahmātmatvasya pratipattirupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:576: tatra brūmaḥ- yadyapi svapnadarśanāvasthasya sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryamanṛtaṃ tathāpi tadavagatiḥ satyameva phalaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:578: nahi svapnādutthitaḥ svapnadṛṣṭaṃ sarpadaṃśanodakasnānādikāryaṃ mithyeti manyamānastadavagatimapi mithyeti manyate kaścit /
GSP33brssbh2u:580: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'yadā karmasu kāmyeṣu striyaṃ svapneṣu paśyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:582: ityasatyena svapnadarśanena satyāyāḥ samṛddheḥ pratipattiṃ darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:583_0: tathā pratyakṣadarśaneṣu keṣucidariṣṭeṣu jāteṣu 'na ciramiva jīviṣyatīti vidyāt'
GSP33brssbh2u:583_1: ityuktvā 'atha svapnāḥ puruṣaṃ kṛṣṇaṃ kṛṣṇadantaṃ paśyati sa enaṃ hanti' ityādinā
GSP33brssbh2u:583_2: tena tenāsatyenaiva svapnadarśanena satyaṃ maraṇaṃ sūcyata iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:584: prasiddhaṃ cedaṃ loke 'nvayavyatirekakuśalānāmīdṛśena svapnadarśanena sādhvāgamaḥ sūcyata īdṛśenāsādhvāgama iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:586: apicāntyamidaṃ pramāṇamātmaikatvasya pratipādakaṃ nātaḥ paraṃ kiñcidākāṅkṣyamasti /
GSP33brssbh2u:587: yathāhi loke yajetetyukte kiṃ kena kathamityākāṅkṣyate naivaṃ 'tattvamasi' 'ahaṃ brahmāsmi' ityukte kiñcidanyadākāṅkṣyamasti,
GSP33brssbh2u:591: na ceyamavagatirnopapadyata iti śakyaṃ vaktum, 'taddhāsya vijajñau' (chā. 6.16.3) ityādiśrutibhyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:592: avagatisādhanānāṃ ca śravaṇādīnāṃ vedānuvacanādīnāṃ ca vidhānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:596: tasmādantyena pramāṇena pratipādita ātmaikatve samastasya prācīnasya bhedavyavahārasya bādhitatvānnānekātmakabrahmakalpanāvakāśo 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:598: pariṇāmino hi mṛdādayor'thā loke samadhigatā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:604: nahyekasya brahmaṇaḥ pariṇāmadharmatvaṃ tadrahitatvaṃ ca śkyaṃ pratipattum /
GSP33brssbh2u:610: naca yathā brahmaṇa ātmaikatvadarśanaṃ mokṣasādhanamevaṃ jagadākārapariṇāmitvadarśanamapi svatantrameva kasmaicitphalāyābhipreyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:612: kūṭasthabrahmātmavijñānādeva hi phalaṃ darśayati śāstram- 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramya 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:614_1: phalasiddhau satyāṃ yattatrāphalaṃ śrūyate brahmaṇo jagadākārapariṇāmitvādi tadbrahmadarśanopāyatvenaiva viniyujyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:624: sā pratijñā tadavasthaiva na tadviruddhor'thaḥ punarihocyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:627: sarvajñasyeśvarasyātmabhūta ivāvidyākalpite nāmarūpe tattvānyatvābhyāmanirvacanīye saṃsāraprapañcabījabhūte sarvajñasyeśvarasya māyāśaktiḥ prakṛtiriti ca śrutismṛtyorabhilapyete /
GSP33brssbh2u:628: tābhyāmanyaḥ sarvajña īśvaraḥ 'ākāśo vai nāma nāmarūpayornirvahitā te yadantarā tadbrahma' (chā. 8.14.1) iti śruteḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:630: , 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' (tai. ā. 3.12.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:634: sa ca svātmabhūtāneva ghaṭākāśasthānīyānavidyāpratyupasthāpitanāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātānurodhino jīvākhyānvijñānātmanaḥ pratīṣṭe vyavahāraviṣaye /
GSP33brssbh2u:635_1: ca na paramārthato vidyāyāpāstasarvopādhisvarūpa ātmanīśitrīśitavyasarvajñatvādivyavahāra upapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:636: tathācoktam- 'yatra nānyatpaśyati nānyacchṛṇoti nānyadvijānāti sa bhūmā' (chā. 7.24.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:637: iti 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena paśyet' (bṛ. 4.5.15) ityādinā ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:638: evaṃ paramārthāvasthāyāṃ sarvavyavahārābhāvaṃ vadanti vedāntāḥ sarve /
GSP33brssbh2u:639: tatheśvaragītāsvapi- 'na kartṛtvaṃ na karmāṇi lokasya sṛjati prabhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:641: nādatte kasyacitpāpaṃ na caiva sukṛtaṃ vibhuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:644: vyavahārāvasthāyāṃ tūktaḥ śrutāvapīśvarādivyavahāraḥ 'eṣa sarveśvara eṣa bhūtādhipatireṣa bhūtapāla eṣa seturvidhāraṇa eṣāṃ lokānāmasaṃbhedāya' (bṛ. 4.4.22) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:648: vyavahārābhiprāyeṇa tu syāllokavaditi mahāsamudrasthānīyatāṃ brahmaṇaḥ kathayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:649: apratyākhyāyaiva kāryaprapañcaṃ pariṇāmaprakriyāṃ cāśrayati saguṇopāsaneṣūpayokṣyata iti // 14 //
GSP33brssbh2u:658: rekhāsvakāratvādibhrāntyā satyā akārādayo jñāyanta iti prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:661: itaśca kāraṇādananyatvaṃ kāryasya, yatkāraṇaṃ bhāva eva kāraṇasya kāryamupalabhyate, nābhāve /
GSP33brssbh2u:662: tadyathā satyāṃ mṛdi ghaṭa upalabhyate satsu ca tantuṣu paṭaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:670: atha dhūmaṃ kayācidavasthayā viśiṃṣyādīdṛśo dhūmo nāsatyāgnau bhavatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:671: naivamapi kaściddoṣaḥ tadbhāvānuraktāṃ hi buddhiṃ kāryakāraṇayorananyatve hetuṃ vayaṃ vadāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:678: tantusaṃsthāne paṭe tantuvyatirekeṇa paṭo nāma kāryaṃ naivopalabhyate kevalāstu tantava ātānavitānavantaḥ pratyakṣamupalabhyante,
GSP33brssbh2u:680: anayā pratyakṣopalabdhyā lohitaśuklakṛṣṇāni trīṇi tato rūpāṇi vāyumātramākāśamātraṃ cetyanumeyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:681: (chā. 6.4) tataḥ paraṃ brahmaikamevādvitīyaṃ, tatra sarvapramāṇānāṃ niṣṭhāmavocāma // 15 //
GSP33brssbh2u:683: FN: kāraṇasya bhāve sattve upalabdhau ca kāryasya sattvādupalabdheścānanyatvamiti sūtrārthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:687: yatkāraṇaṃ prāgutpatteḥ kāraṇātmanaiva kāraṇe sattvamavarakālīnasya kāryasya śrūyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:691: yacca yadātmanā yatra na vartate na tattata utpadyate, yathā sikatābhyastailam /
GSP33brssbh2u:693: yathāca kāraṇaṃ brahma triṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicaratyevaṃ kāryamapi jagattriṣu kāleṣu sattvaṃ na vyabhicarati /
GSP33brssbh2u:696: asadvyapadeśān neti cen na dharmāntareṇa vākyaśeṣāt | BBs_2,1.17 |
GSP33brssbh2u:697: nanu kvacidasattvamapi prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'asadevedamagra āsīt (chā. 3.19.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:702: kiṃ tarhi vyākṛtanāmarūpatvāddharmādavyākṛtanāmarūpatvaṃ dharmāntaraṃ tena dharmāntareṇāyamasadvyapadeśaḥ prāgutpatteḥ sata eva kāryasya kāraṇarūpeṇānanyasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:706: iha ca tāvat 'asadevedamagra āsīt' ityasacchabdenopakrame nirdiṣṭaṃ yattadeva punastacchabdena parāmṛśya saditi viśinaṣṭi 'tatsadāsīt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:708: 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' ityatrāpi 'tadātmānaṃ svayamakuruta' iti vākyaśeṣe viśeṣaṇānnātyantāsattvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:710: nāmarūpavyākṛtaṃ hi vastu sacchabdārhaṃ loke prasiddham /
GSP33brssbh2u:713: FN: agre śūnyamāsīcchūnyādeva jagatabhūditi pūrvaḥ pakṣaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:714: rāddhānte tu idaṃ jagadagre sṛṣṭeḥ prāgasadavyākṛtanāmarūpatvādasattulyamatisūkṣmaṃ brahmaivāsīt /
GSP33brssbh2u:718: yukteśca prāgutpatteḥ kāryasya sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate, śabdāntarācca /
GSP33brssbh2u:719: yuktistāvadvarṇyate- dadhighaṭarucakādyarthibhiḥ pratiniyatāni kāraṇāni kṣīramṛttikāsuvarṇādīnyupādīyamānāni loke dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:720: nahi dadhyarthibhirmṛttikopādīyate na ghaṭārthibhiḥ kṣīraṃ tadasatkāryavāde nopapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:721: aviśiṣṭe hi prāgutpatteḥ sarvasya sarvatrāsatve kasmātkṣīrādeva dadhyutpadyate na mṛttikāyāḥ mṛttikāyā eva ca ghaṭa utpadyate na kṣīrāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:722: athāviśiṣṭe 'pi prāgasattve kṣīra eva dadhnaḥ kaścidatiśayo na mṛttikāyāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:723: mṛttikāyāmeva ca ghaṭasya kaścidatiśayo na kṣīra ityucyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:725: śaktiśca kāraṇasya kāryaniyamārthā kalpamānā nānyāsatī vā kāryaṃ niyacchet /
GSP33brssbh2u:729: samavāyakalpanāyāmapi samavāyasya samavāyibhiḥ saṃbandhe 'bhyupagamyamāne tasya tasyānyonyaḥ saṃbandhaḥ kalpayitavya ityanavasthāprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:731: atha samavāyaḥ svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaivāparaṃ saṃbandhaṃ saṃbadhyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:732: saṃyogo 'pi tarhi svayaṃ saṃbandharūpatvādanapekṣyaiva samavāyaṃ saṃbadhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:734: kathaṃ ca kāryamavayavidravyaṃ kāraṇeṣvavayavadravyeṣu vartamānaṃ vartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:738: nahi bahutvaṃ samasteṣvāśrayeṣu vartamānaṃ vyastāśrayagrahaṇena gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:739_1: kalpyeran yairārambhakeṣvavayaveṣvavayavaśo 'vayavī varteta kośāvayavavyatiriktairhyavayavairasiḥ kośaṃ vyāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:742: atha pratyavayavaṃ varteta tadaikatra vyāpāre.'nyatrāvyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:743: nahi devadattaḥ snughne saṃnidhīyamānastadahareva pāṭaliputre 'pi saṃnidhīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:749: yadi gotvādivatpratyekaṃ parisamāpto 'vayavī syādyathā gotvaṃ prativyakti pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyata evamavayavyapi pratyavayavaṃ pratyakṣaṃ gṛhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:751: pratyekaparisamāptau cāvayavinaḥ kāryeṇādhikārāttasya caikatvācchṛṅgeṇāpi stanakāryaṃ kuryādurasā ca pṛṣṭhakāryam /
GSP33brssbh2u:753: prāgutpatteśca kāryasyāsattva utpattirakartṛkā nirātmikā ca syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:754: utpacattiśca nāma kriyā, sā sakartṛkaiva bhavitumarhati gatyādivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:755: kriyā ca nāma syādakartṛkā ceti vipratiṣidhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:756: ghaṭasya cetpattirucyamānā na ghaṭakartṛkā kiṃ tarihyanyakartṛketi kalpyā syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:758: tathāca sati ghaṭa utpadyata ityukte kulālādīnāmapyutpadyamānatā pratīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:762: satorhi dvayoḥ saṃbandhaḥ saṃbhavati na sadasatorasatorvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:764: satāṃ hi loke kṣetragṛhādīnāṃ maryādā dṛṣṭā nābhāvasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:765_0: nahi vandhyāputro rājā babhūva prākpūrṇavarmaṇo 'bhiṣekādityevañjātīyakena maryādākāraṇena
GSP33brssbh2u:765_2: maryādākaraṇena nirupākhyo vandhyaputro rājā babhūva bhavati bhaviṣyatīti vā viśeṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:766: yadi ca vandyāputro 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvamabhaviṣyattata idamapyupātsyata kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:767: vayaṃ tu paśyāmo vandyāputrasya kāryābhāvasya cābhāvatvāviśeṣādyathā vandhyāputraḥ kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatyevaṃ kāryābhāvo 'pi kārakavyāpārādūrdhvaṃ na bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:770: evaṃ prāksiddhatvāttadananyatvācca kāryasya svarūpasiddhaye 'pi na kaścidvyāpriyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:778: nahi devadattaḥ saṃkocitahastapādaḥ prasāritahastapādaśca viśeṣaṇa dṛśyamāno 'pi vastvanyatvaṃ gacchati,
GSP33brssbh2u:780: tathā pratidinamanekasaṃsthānānāmapi pitrādīnāṃ na vastvanyatvaṃ bhavati,
GSP33brssbh2u:781: mama pitā mama bhrātā mama putra iti pratyabhijñānāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:785: adṛśyamānānāmapi vaṭadhānādīnāṃ samānajātīyāvayavāntaropacitānāmaṅ kurādibhāvena darśanagocaratāpattau janmasaṃjñā /
GSP33brssbh2u:787: tatredṛgjanmocchedāntaritatvāccedasataḥ sattvapattistathā sati garbhavāsina uttānaśāyinaśca bhedaprasaṅgaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:790: yasyapunaḥ prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ tasya nirviṣayaḥ kārakavyāpāraḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:798: tasmātkṣīrādīnyeva dravyāṇi dadhyādibhāvenāvatiṣṭhamānāni kāryākhyāṃ labhanta iti na kāraṇādanyatkāryaṃ varṣaśatenāpi śakyaṃ niścetum /
GSP33brssbh2u:799: tathā mūlakāraṇamevāntyātkāryāttena tena kāryākāreṇa naṭavatsarvavyavahārāspadatvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:800: evaṃ yukteḥ kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sattvamananyatvaṃ ca kāraṇādavagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:802: pūrvasūtre 'sadvyapadeśinaḥ śabdasyodāhṛtatvāttato 'nyaḥ sadvyapadeśī śabdaḥ śabdāntaram- 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīdekamevādvitīyam' ityādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:803: 'taddhaika āhurasadevedamagra āsīt' iti cāsatpakṣamupakṣipya 'kathamasataḥ sajjāyeta' ityākṣipya 'sadeva somyedamagra āsīt' (chā. 6.2.1) ityavadhārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:804: tatredaṃśabdavācyasya kāryasya prāgutpatteḥ sacchabdavācyena kāraṇena sāmānādhikaraṇyasya śrūyamāṇatvātsattvānanyatve prasiddhyataḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:805: yadi tu prāgutpatterasatkāryaṃ syātpaścāccotpadyamānaṃ kāraṇe samaveyāttadānyakāraṇātsyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:806: tatra 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3) itīyaṃ pratijñā pīḍyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:816: yathā ca saṃveṣṭitaḥ paṭo na vyaktaṃ gṛhyate kimayaṃ paṭaḥ kiṃ vānyaddravyamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:817: sa eva prasārito yatsaṃveṣṭitaṃ dravyaṃ tatpaṭa eveti prasāraṇenābhivyakto gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:818: yathāca saṃveṣṭanasamaye paṭa iti gṛhyamāṇe 'pi na viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate sa eva prasāraṇasamaye viśiṣṭāyāmavistāro gṛhyate na saṃveṣṭitarūpādanyo 'yaṃ bhinnaḥ paṭa iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:819: evaṃ tantvādikāraṇāvasthaṃ paṭādikāryamaspaṣṭaṃ sat turīvemakuvindādikārakavyāpāradibhirvyaktaṃ spaṣṭaṃ gṛhyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:825: yathā ca loke prāṇāpānādiṣu prāṇabhedeṣu prāṇāyāmena niruddheṣu kāraṇamātreṇa rūpeṇa vartamāneṣu jīvanamātraṃ kāryaṃ nivartyate nākuñcanaprasāraṇādikaṃ kāryāntaram /
GSP33brssbh2u:826: teṣveva prāṇabhedeṣu punaḥ pravṛtteṣu jīvanādadhikamākuñcanaprāsāraṇādikamapi kāryāntaraṃ nirvartyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:829: ataśca kṛtsnasya jagato brahmakāryatvāttadananyatvācca siddhaiṣā śrautī pratijñā 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavatyamataṃ matamavijñātaṃ vijñātam' (chā. 6.1.1) iti // 20 //
GSP33brssbh2u:837: itarasya śārīrasya brahmātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati śrutiḥ - 'sa ātmā tattvamasi śvetaketo' (chā. 6.8.7) iti prabodhanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:839: itarasya ca brahmaṇaḥ śārīrātmatvaṃ vyapadiśati 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (tai. 2.6)
GSP33brssbh2u:842: iti ca parā devatā jīvamātmaśabdena vyapadiśantī na brahmaṇo bhinnaḥ śārīra iti darśayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:844: ataḥ sa svatantraḥ kartā san hitamevātmanaḥ saumanasyakaraṃ kuryānnāhitaṃ janmamaraṇajarārogādyanekānarthajālam /
GSP33brssbh2u:850: sarvo hi lokaḥ spaṣṭaṃ kāryaṃ kṛtvā smarati mayedaṃ kṛtamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:861: nahi tasya hitaṃ kiñcitkartavyamastyahitaṃ vā parihartavyaṃ, nityamuktasvabhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:862: naca tasya jñānapratibandhaḥ śaktipratibandho vā kvacidapyasti, sarvajñatvātsarvaśaktitvācca /
GSP33brssbh2u:864: natu taṃ vayaṃ jagataḥ sraṣṭāraṃ brūmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:867: 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyāsitavyaḥ'' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:876: apica yadā tattvamasītyevañjātīyakenābhedanirdeśenābhedaḥ pratibodhito bhavatyapagataṃ bhavati tadā jīvasya saṃsāritvaṃ brahmaṇaśca sraṣṭṛtvaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:878: tatra kuta eva sṛṣṭiḥ kuto vā hitākaraṇādayo doṣāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:881: abādhite tu bhedavyavahāre 'se 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' ityevañjātīyakena bhedanirdeśenāvagamyamānaṃ brahmaṇo 'dhikatvaṃ hitākaraṇādidoṣaprasaktiṃ niruṇaddhi // 22 //

GSP33brssbh2u:884_1: 'nye madhyamavīryāḥ sūryakāntādayo 'nye prahīṇāḥ śvavāyasaprakṣepaṇārhāḥ pāṣāṇā ityanekavidhaṃ

GSP33brssbh2u:894: upasaṃhāradarśanān neti cen na kṣīravad dhi | BBs_2,1.24 |
GSP33brssbh2u:895: cetanaṃ brahmaikamadvitīyaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti yaduktaṃ tannopapadyate /

GSP33brssbh2u:899: brahma cāsahāyaṃ tavābhipretaṃ tasya sādhanāntarānupasaṃgrahe sati kathaṃ sraṣṭṛtvamupapadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:903: yathā hi loke kṣīraṃ jalaṃ vā svayameva dadhihimabhāvena pariṇamate 'napekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ tathehāpi bhaviṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:904: nanu kṣīrādyapi dadhyādibhāvena pariṇāmamānapekṣata eva bāhyaṃ sādhanamauṣṇyādikaṃ kathamucyate kṣīravaddhīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:906: svayamapi hi kṣīraṃ yāṃ ca yāvatīṃ ca pariṇāmamātramanubhavati tāvatyeva tvāryate tvauṣṇyādinā dadhibhāvāya /
GSP33brssbh2u:907: yadi ca svayaṃ dadhibhāvaśīlatā na syānnaivauṣṇyādināpi balāddadhibhāvamāpadyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:912: śrutiśca bhavati- 'na tasya kāryaṃ kāraṇaṃ ca vidyate na tatsamaścābhyadhikaśca dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:913: parāsya śaktirvividhaiva śrūyate svābhāvikī jñānabalakriyā ca //
GSP33brssbh2u:922: upapadyate kṣīrādīnāmacetanānāmanapekṣyāpi bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ dadhyādibhāvaḥ, dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:923: cetanāḥ punaḥ kulālādayaḥ sādhanasāmagrīmapekṣyaiva tasmai kāryāya pravartamānā dṛśyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:926_0: yathā loke devāḥ pitara ṛṣaya ityevamādayo mahāprabhāvāścetanā api santo 'napekṣyaiva
GSP33brssbh2u:926_2: śarīrīṇi prāsādādīni ca rathādīni ca nirmimāṇā upalabhyante mantrārthavādetihāsapurāṇaprāmāṇyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:930: evaṃ cetanamapi brahmānapekṣya bāhyaṃ sādhanaṃ svata eva jagatsrakṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:931: sa yadi brūyādya ete devādayo brahmaṇo dṛṣṭāntā upāttāste dārṣṭrāntikena brahmaṇā na samānā bhavanti /
GSP33brssbh2u:932: śarīrameva hyacetanaṃ devādīnāṃ śarīrāntarādivibhūtyutpādana upādānaṃ natu cetana ātmā /
GSP33brssbh2u:935: padminī ca cetanaprayuktā satyacetanevaiva śarīreṇa sarontaropasarpaṇe vyāpriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:939: yathā hi kulālādīnāṃ devādīnāṃ ca samāne cetanatve kulālādayaḥ kāryārambhe bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣante na devādayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:940: tathā brahma cetanamapi na bāhyaṃ sādhanamapekṣiṣyata ityetadvākyaṃ devādyudāharaṇena vivakṣyāmaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:941: tasmādyathaikasya sāmarthyaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ tathā sarveṣāmeva bhavitumarhatīti nāstyekānta ityabhiprāyaḥ // 25 //
GSP33brssbh2u:943: FN: lokyate jñāyater'thoneneti loko mantrārthavādādiśāstraṃ vṛddhavyavahāraśca /
GSP33brssbh2u:945: yathā bhārate śrīkṛṣṇasya saṃkalpamātreṇa draupadyāḥ paṭaparamparotpattiḥ tathā asahāyasyāpi brahmaṇaḥ kāraṇatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:949: cetanamekamadvitīyaṃ brahma kṣīrādivaddevādivaccānapekṣya bāhyasādhanaṃ svayaṃ pariṇamamānaṃ jagataḥ kāraṇamiti sthitam /
GSP33brssbh2u:951: kṛtsnaprasaktiḥ kṛtsnasya brahmaṇaḥ kāryarūpeṇa pariṇāmaḥ prāpnoti,
GSP33brssbh2u:954: niravayavaṃ tu brahma śrutibhyo 'vagamyate- 'niṣkalaṃ niṣkriyaṃ śāntaṃ niravadyaṃ nirañjanam' (śve. 6.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:963: athaitaddoṣaparijihīrṣayā sāvayavameva brahmābhyupagamyeta tathāpi ye niravayavatvasya pratipādakāḥ śabdā udāhṛtāste prakuṣyeyuḥ /

GSP33brssbh2u:977: prakṛtivikārayorbhedena vyapadeśāt 'seyaṃ devataikṣata hantāhamimāstisro devatā anena jīvenātmanānupraviśya nāmarūpe vyākaravāṇi' (chā. 6.3.2)
GSP33brssbh2u:979: pādo 'sya sarvā bhūtāni tripādasyāmṛtaṃ divi' (chā. 3.12.6) iti caivañjātīyakāt /

GSP33brssbh2u:987: śabdamūlaṃ ca brahma śabdapramāṇakaṃ nendriyādipramāṇakaṃ tadyathāśabdamabhyupagantavyam /

GSP33brssbh2u:991: kimutācintyasvabhāvasya brahmaṇo rūpaṃ vinā śabdena na nirūpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:992: tathācāhuḥ paurāṇikāḥ - 'acintyāḥ khalu ye bhāvā na tāṃstarkeṇa yojayet /
GSP33brssbh2u:995: nanu śabdenāpi na śakyate viruddhor'thaḥ pratyāyayituṃ niravayavaṃ ca brahma pariṇamate naca kṛtsnamiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:998: atha kenacidrūpeṇa pariṇameta kenaciccāvatiṣṭheteti rūpabhedakalpanātsāvayavameva prasajyeta /

GSP33brssbh2u:1007: vācārambhaṇamātratvāccāvidyākalpitasya nāmarūpabhedasyeti na niravayavatvaṃ brahmaṇaḥ kupyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:1010: 'sa eṣa neti netyātmā' ityupakramyāha- 'abhayaṃ vai janaka prāpto 'si' (bṛ. 4.2.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:1013: ātmani caivaṃ vicitrāś ca hi | BBs_2,1.28 |
