GSP33brssbh2u:3319: evamayamapi buddhisaṃbandhaḥ śaktyātmanā vidyamāna eva suṣuptapralayayoḥ punaḥ prabodhaprasavayorāvirbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3323: darśayati ca suṣuptādutthānamavidyātmakabījasadbhāvakāritam- 'sati saṃpadya na viduḥ sati saṃpadyamāha' iti ta iha vyāghro vā saṃho vā' (chā. 6.9.3) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3327: taccātmana upādhibhūtamantaḥkaraṇaṃ mano buddhirvijñānaṃ ctitamiti cānekadhā tatra tatrābhilapyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3328: kvacicca vṛttivibhāgena saṃśayādivṛttikaṃ mana ityucyate, niścayādivṛttikaṃ buddhiriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3332: atha satyapi hetusamavadhāne phalābhāvastato nityamevānupalabdhiḥ prasajyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3338: nahi tasya pūrvottarayoḥ kṣaṇayorapratibaddhaśaktikasya sato 'kasmācchaktiḥ pratibadhyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3340: tathāca śrutiḥ - 'anyatrātmanā abhūvaṃ nādarśamanyatramanā abhūvaṃ nāśrauṣam' (bṛ. 1.5.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:3341: iti, 'manasā hyeva paśyati manasā śṛṇoti' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3342: kāmādayaścāsya vṛttaya iti darśayati 'kāmaḥ saṃkalpo vicikitsā śraddhāśraddhā dhṛtiradhṛtirhīrbhīrityetatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3356: tathedamapi śāstramarthavadbhavati eṣa hi draṣṭā śrotā mantā boddhā kartā vijñānātmā puruṣaḥ (pra. 5.9) iti // 33 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3360: yajjīvaprakriyāyāṃ saṃdhye sthāne vihāramupadiśati- 'sa īyate 'mṛto yatra kāmam' (bṛ. 4.3.12)
GSP33brssbh2u:3361: iti, 'sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartate' (bṛ. 2.1.18) iti ca // 34 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3368: yajjīvaprakriyāyāmeva karaṇānāmupādānaṃ saṃkīrtayati- 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 21.1.17)
GSP33brssbh2u:3371: FN: prāṇānāmindryāṇāṃ vijñānena buddhyā vijñānaṃ grahaṇaśaktimādāya svāpe jīvo hṛdayametīti yojanā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3373: vyapadeśāc ca kriyāyāṃ na cen nirdeśaviparyayaḥ | BBs_2,3.36 |
GSP33brssbh2u:3375: yadasya laukikīṣu vaidikīṣu ca kriyāsu kartṛtvaṃ vyapadiśati śāstram- 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute karmāṇi tanute 'pi ca' (tai. 2.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3382: tathā hyanyatra buddhivivakṣāyāṃ vijñānaśabdasya karaṇavibhaktinirdeśo dṛśyate 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' (bṛ. 2.1.17) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3385: atrāha- yadi buddhivyatirikto jīvaḥ kartā syātsa svatantraḥ sanpriyaṃ hitaṃ caivātmano niyamena saṃpādayenna viparītam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3391: yathāyamātmopalabdhiṃ prati svatantro 'pyaniyameneṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ copalabhata evamaniyamenaiveṣṭamaniṣṭaṃ ca saṃpādayiṣyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3403: yadi purvijñānaśabdavācyā buddhireva kartrī syāttataḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3405: satyāṃ ca buddheḥ kartṛśaktau tasyā evāhaṃpratyayaviṣayatvamabhyupagantavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3409: śakto 'pi hi sankartā karaṇamupādāya kriyāsu pravartamāno dṛśyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3410: tataśca saṃjñāmātre vivādaḥ syānna vastubhedaḥ kaścit /
GSP33brssbh2u:3414: yo 'pyayamaupaniṣadātmapratipattiprayojanaḥ samādhirupadiṣṭo vedānteṣu- 'ātmā vā are draṣṭavyaḥ śrotavyo mantavyo nididhyasitavya so 'nveṣṭavyaḥ sa vijijñāsitavyaḥ' (bṛ. 2.4.5)
GSP33brssbh2u:3422: tatpunaḥ svābhāvikaṃ vā syādupādhinimittaṃ veti cintyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3426: kartṛtvasvabhāve hyātmano na kartṛtvānnirmokṣaḥ saṃbhavati, agnerivauṣṇyāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3442: nahi vivekināṃ parasmādanyo jīvo nāma kartā bhoktā vā vidyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3444: para eva tarhi saṃsārī kartā bhoktā ca prasajyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:3448: tathāca śāstram- 'yatra hi dvaitamiva bhavati taditara itaraṃ paśyati' (bṛ. 2.4.14)
GSP33brssbh2u:3449: ityavidyāvasthāyāṃ kartṛtvabhoktṛtve darśayitvā vidyāvasthāyāṃ te eva kartṛtvabhoktṛtve nivārayati- 'yatra tvasya sarvamātmaivābhūttatkena kaṃ paśyet' (bṛ. 2.4.14) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3450_0: tathā svapnajāgaritayorātmana upādhisaṃparkakṛtaṃ śramaṃ śyenasyevākāśe viparipatataḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:3450_1: śrāvayitvā tadabhāvaṃ suṣuptau prājñenātmanā saṃpariṣvaktasya śrāvayati- 'tadvā asyaitadāptakāmamātmakāmamakāmaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3451: ityārabhya eṣāsya paramā gatireṣāsya paramā saṃpadeṣo 'sya paramo loka eṣo 'syaparama ānandaḥ (bṛ. 4.3.32) ityupasaṃhārāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3455_0: yathā tu takṣā loke vāsyādikaraṇahastaḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa eva svagṛhaṃ prāpto
GSP33brssbh2u:3455_2: ātmā svapnajāgaritāvasthayoḥ kartā duḥkhī bhavati sa tacchramāpanuttaye svamātmānaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3455_3: paraṃ brahma praviśya vimuktakāryakaraṇasaṃghāto 'kartā sukhī bhavati saṃprasādāvasthāyām /
GSP33brssbh2u:3456: tathā muktyavasthāyāmapyavidyādhvāntaṃ vidyāpradīpena vidhūyātmaiva kevalo nivṛttaḥ sukhī bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3458: takṣā hi viśiṣṭheṣu takṣaṇādivyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva pratiniyatāni karaṇāni vāsyādīni kartā bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3460: evamayamātmā sarvavyāpāreṣvapekṣyaiva manaādīni karaṇāni kartā bhavati, svātmanā tvakartaiveti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3461: natvātmanasthakṣṇa ivāvayavāḥ santi yairhastādibhiriva vāsyādīni takṣā manaādīni karaṇānyātmopādadīta nyasyedvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3464: vidhiśāstraṃ tāvadyathāprāptaṃ kartṛtvamupādāya kartavyaviśeṣamupadiśati na kartṛtvamātmanaḥ pratipādayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3470: nanu saṃdhye sthāne prasupteṣu karaṇeṣu sve śarīre yathākāmaṃ parivartata iti vihāra upadiśyamānaḥ kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvamāvahati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3471: tathopādāne 'pi 'tadeṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ vijñānena vijñānamādāya' iti karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktī śrūyamāṇe kevalasyātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ gamayata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3472: atrocyate- na tāvatsaṃdhye sthāne 'tyantamātmanaḥ karaṇaviramaṇamasti / 'sadhīḥ svapno bhūtvemaṃ lokamatikrāmati' (bṛ.4.3.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:3473_0: iti tatrāpi dhīsaṃbandhaśravaṇāt / tathāca smaranti- 'indriyāṇāmuparame mano 'nuparataṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3473_1: yadi / sevate viṣayāneva tadvidyātsvapnadarśanam' iti / 'kāmādayaśca manaso vṛttayaḥ'
GSP33brssbh2u:3473_2: iti śrutiḥ / tāśca svapne dṛśyante / tasmātsamanā eva svapne viharati / vihāro 'pi
GSP33brssbh2u:3473_3: ca tatratyo vāsanāmaya eva natu pāramārthiko 'sti / tathāca śrutirivākārānubaddhameva
GSP33brssbh2u:3473_4: svapnavyāpāraṃ varṇayati- 'uteva strībhiḥ saha modamāno jakṣadutevāpi bhayāni paśyan' (bṛ. 4.3.13)
GSP33brssbh2u:3474: iti / laukikā api tathaiva svapnaṃ kathayanti- ārukṣamiva giriśṛṅgamadrākṣamiva vanarājimiti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3475: tathopādāne 'pi yadyapi karaṇeṣu karmakaraṇavibhaktinirdeśastathāpi tatsaṃpṛktasyaivātmanaḥ kartṛtvaṃ draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3477: bhavati ca loke 'nekaprakārā vivakṣā yodhā yudhyante yodhai rājā yudhyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3478: apicāsminnupādāne karaṇavyāpāroparamamātraṃ vivakṣyate na svātantryaṃ kasyacidabuddhipūrvakasyāpi svāpe karaṇavyāpāroparamasya dṛṣṭatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3479: yastvayaṃ vyapadeśo darśitaḥ 'vijñānaṃ yajñaṃ tanute' iti, sa buddhereva kartṛtvaṃ prāpayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3482: 'tasya śraddhaiva śiraḥ' (tai. 2.4) iti ca vijñānamayasyātmanaḥ śraddhādyavayavatvasaṃkīrtanāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3484: 'vijñānaṃ devāḥ sarve brahma jyeṣṭhamupāsate' (tai. 2.5.1) iti ca vākyaśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3486: 'sa eṣa vācaścittasyottarottarakramo yadyajñaḥ' iti ca śrutyantare yajñasya vāgbuddhisādhyatvāvadhāramāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3487: naca buddheḥ śaktiviparyayaḥ karaṇānāṃ kartṛtvābhyupagame bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3489: upalabdhyapekṣaṃ tveṣāṃ karaṇānāṃ karaṇatvaṃ, sā cātmanaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3512: tatra prāptaṃ tāvanneśvaramapekṣate jīvaḥ kartṛtva iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3515: ayaṃ hi jīvaḥ svayameva rāgadveṣādidoṣaprayuktaḥ kārakāntarasāmagrīsamapannaḥ kartṛtvamanubhavituṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3517: naca loke prasiddhirasti kṛṣyādikāsu kriyāsvanaḍudādivadīśvaro 'paro 'pekṣitavya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3518: kleṣātmakena ca kartṛtvena jantūnsaṃsṛjata īśvarasya nairghṛṇyaṃ prasajyeta,
GSP33brssbh2u:3522: sāpekṣatvaṃ ceśvarasya saṃbhavati satorjantūnāṃ dharmādharmayostayośca sadbhāvaḥ sati jīvasya kartṛtve /
GSP33brssbh2u:3526: etāṃ prāptiṃ tuśabdena vyāvartya pratijānīte- 'parāt' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3532: yadyapi ca loke kṛṣyādiṣu karmasu neśvarakāraṇatvaṃ prasiddhaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3534: tathāhi śrutirbhavati- 'eṣa hyeva sādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamebhyo lokebhya unninīyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3535: eṣa hyevāsādhu karma kārayati taṃ yamadho ninīṣate' (kauṣī. 3.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3537: nanvevamīśvarasya kārayitṛtve sati vaiṣamyanairghaṇye syātāmakṛtābhyāgamaśca jīvasyeti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3542: kṛto yaḥ prayatno jīvasya dharmādharmalakṣaṇastadapekṣa evainamīśvaraḥ kārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3544: jīvakṛtadharmādharmavaiṣamyāpekṣa eva tattatphalāni viṣamaṃ vibhajetparjanyavadīśvaro nimittatvamātreṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:3545: yathā loke nānāvidhānāṃ gucchagulmādīnāṃ vrīhiyavādīnāṃ cāsādhāraṇebhyaḥ svasvabījebhyo jāyamānānāṃ sādhāraṇaṃ nimittaṃ bhavati parjanyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3548: evaṃ jīvakṛtaprayatnāpekṣa īśvarasteṣāṃ śubhāśubhaṃ vidadhyāditi śliṣyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3549: nanu kṛtaprayatnāpekṣatvameva jīvasya parāyatte kartṛtve nopapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3553: apica pūrvaprayatnamapekṣyedānīṃ kārayati pūrvataraṃ ca prayatnamapekṣya pūrvamakārayadityanāditvātsaṃsārasyetyanavadyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3563: īśvarasya cātyantānapekṣatve laukikasyāpi puruṣakārasya vaiyarthyaṃ tathā deśakālanimittānāṃ pūrvoktadoṣaprasaṅgaścetyevañjātīyakaṃ doṣajātamādigrahaṇena darśayati // 42 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3566: aṃśo nānāvyapadeśād anyathā cāpi dāśakitavāditvam adhīyata eke | BBs_2,3.43 |
GSP33brssbh2u:3568: sa ca saṃbaddhayoreva loke dṛṣṭo yathā svāmibhṛtyayoryathā vāgnivisphuliṅgayoḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3569: tataśca jīveśvarayorapyupakāryopakārakabhāvābhyupagamātkiṃ svāmibhṛtyavatsaṃbandha āhosvidagnivisphuliṅgavadityasyāṃ vicikitsāyāmaniyamo vā prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3570: athavā svāmibhṛtyaprakāreṣveveśitrīśitavyabhāvasya prasiddhatvāttadvidha eva saṃbandha iti prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3573: aṃśa ivāṃśo nahi niravayavasya mukhyoṃ'śaḥ saṃbhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3577: 'etameva viditvā munirbhavati' ' ya ātmani tiṣṭhannātmānamantaro yamayati' iti caivañjātīyako bhedanirdeśo nāsati bhede yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3578: nanu cāyaṃ nānāvyapadeśaḥ sutarāṃ svāmibhṛtyasārūpye yujyata ityata āha- anyathā cāpīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3580: kiṃ tarhyanyathā cāpi vyapadeśo bhavatyanānātvasya pratipādakaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3581: tathāhi- eke śākhino dāśakitavādibhāvaṃ brahmaṇa āmanantyātharvaṇikā brahmasūkte- 'brahma dāśā brahma dāsā brahmaiveme kitavāḥ' ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3584: ye cānye kitavā dyūtakṛtaste sarve brahmaiveti hīnajantūdāharaṇena sarveṣāmeva nāmarūpakṛtakāryakaraṇasaṃghātapraviṣṭānāṃ jīvānāṃ brahmatvamāha /
GSP33brssbh2u:3585: tathānyatrāpi brahmaprakriyāyāmevāyamarthaḥ prapañcyate- 'tvaṃ strī tvaṃ pumānasi tvaṃ kumāra uta vā kumārī /
GSP33brssbh2u:3586: tvaṃ jīrṇo daṇḍena vañcasi tvaṃ jāto bhavasi viśvatomukhaḥ' (śve. 4.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3587: 'sarvāṇi rūpāṇi vicitya dhīro nāmāni kṛtvābhivadanyadāste' iti ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:3603: īśvaragītāsvapi ceśvaraṃśatvaṃ jīvasya smaryate- 'mamaivāṃśo jīvaloke jīvabhūtaḥ sanātanaḥ' (15.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3608: atrāha- nanu jīvasyeśvarāṃśatvābhyupagame tadīyena saṃsāraduḥkhopabhogenāṃśina īśvarasyāpi duḥkhitvaṃ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3609: yathā loke hastapādādyanyatamāṅgagatena duḥkhenāṅgino devadattasya duḥkhitvaṃ tadvat /
GSP33brssbh2u:3611: ato varaṃ pūrvāvasthaḥ saṃsāra evāstviti samyagdarśanānarthakyaprasaṅgaḥ syāditi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3615: yathā jīvaḥ saṃsāraduḥkhamanubhavati naivaṃ para īśvaro 'nubhavatīti pratijānīmahe /
GSP33brssbh2u:3616: jīvo hyavidyāveśavaśāddehādyātmabhāvamiva gatvā tatkṛtena duḥkhena duḥkhyahamityavidyayā kṛtaṃ duḥkhopabhogamabhimanyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3620: tataśca niścitametadavagamyate- mithyābhimānabhramanimitta eva duḥkhānubhava iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3622_0: tathāhi- putramitrādimatsu bahuṣūpaviṣṭeṣu tatsaṃbandhābhimāniṣvitareṣu ca putro
GSP33brssbh2u:3627_1: pratipadyamāneṣu tattadbhāvamiva pratipadyamāno 'pi na paramārthatastadbhāvaṃ pratipadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3628: yathā cākāśo ghaṭādiṣu gacchatsu gacchanniva vibhāvyamāno 'pi na paramārthato gacchati,
GSP33brssbh2u:3629: yathā codaśarāvādikampanāttadgate sūryapratibimbe kampamāne 'pi na tadvānsūryaḥ kampate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3630: evamavidyāpratyupasthāpite buddhyādyupahite jīvākhyeṃ'śe duḥkhāyamāne 'pi na tadvānīśvaro duḥkhāyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3632: tathācāvidyānimittajīvabhāvavyudāsena brahmabhāvameva jīvasya pratipādayanti vedāntāḥ 'tattvamasi' ityevamādayaḥ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3638: smaranti ca vyāsādayo yathā jaivena duḥkhena na paramātmā duḥkhāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3639: 'tatra yaḥ paramātmā hi sa nityo nirguṇaḥ smṛtaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3641: karmātmā tvaparo yo 'sau mokṣabandhanaiḥ sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3642: sa saptadaśakenāpi rāśinā yujyate punaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3645: 'ekastathā sarvabhūtāntarātmā na lipyate lokaduḥkhena bāhyaḥ' (kaṭha. 5.11) iti ca // 47 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3646: atrāha- yadi tarhyeka eva sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā syātkathamanujñāparihārau syātāṃ lokikau vaidikau ceti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3650: anaṃśitvamapi hi jīvasyābhedavādinyaḥ śrutayaḥ pratipādayanti- 'tatsṛṣṭvā tadevānuprāviśat' (te. 2.6.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:3652: , 'mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyumāpnoti ya iha nāneva paśyati' (bṛ. 4.4.19)
GSP33brssbh2u:3657: abheda eva tvatra pratipipādayiṣito brahmātmatvapratipattau puruṣārthasiddheḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3659: naca niravayavasya brahmaṇo mukhyoṃ'śo jīvaḥ saṃbhavatītyuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3660: tasmātparaḥ evaikaḥ sarveṣāṃ bhūtānāmantarātmā jīvabhāvenāvasthita ityato vaktavyānujñāparihāropapattiḥ // 47 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3664: saptadaśakena daśendrayāṇi pañca prāṇaḥ mano buddiśceti saptadaśasaṃkhyāko rāśirliṅgam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3665: mṛtyoḥ sa mṛtyu - iha brahmaṇi yo nāneva kalpitabhedaśāli cetanācetanātmakaṃ viśvaṃ paśyati sa mṛtyoranantaraṃ mṛtyuṃ janmamaraṇādiparamparārūpaṃ saṃsāraṃ prāpnotītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3679: dṛṣṭā ca sā sarvaprāṇināmahaṃ gacchāmyahamāgacchāmyahamandho 'hamanandho 'haṃ mūḍho 'hamamūḍha ityevamātmikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3692: satyaṃ vyatirekadarśino niyojyatvaṃ tathāpi vyomādivaddehādyasaṃhatatvamapaśyata evātmano niyojyatvābhimānaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3700: yathāca prakāśa ekasyāpi savituramedhyadeśasaṃbaddhaḥ parihriyate netaraḥ śucibhūmiṣṭhaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3703: yathā mūtraparīṣaṃ gavāṃ pavitratayā parigṛhyate tadeva jātyantare parivarjyate tadvat // 48 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3711: yatsvayaṃ karmaphalasaṃbandhaḥ sa caikātmyābhyupagame vyatikīryeta svāmyekatvāditi cet /
GSP33brssbh2u:3714: nahi kartṛbhoktṛścātmanaḥ saṃtataḥ sarvaiḥ śarīraiḥ saṃbandho 'sti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3717: tataśca karmavyatikaraḥ phalavyatikaro vā na bhaviṣyati // 49 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3720: ābhāsa eva caiṣa jīvaḥ parasyātmano jalasūryakādivatpratipattavyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3723: ataśca yathā naikasmiñjalasūryake kampamāne jalasūryakāntaraṃ kampate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3728: yeṣāṃ tu bahava ātmānaste ca sarve sarvagatāsteṣāmevaiṣa vyatikaraḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3730: bahavo vibhavaścātmānaścaitanyamātrasvarūpā nirguṇā niratiśayāśca tadarthaṃ sādhāraṇaṃ pradhānaṃ tannimittaiṣāṃ bhogāpavargasiddhiriti sāṃkhyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3731: sati bahutve vibhutve ca ghaṭakuḍyādisamānā dravyamātrasvarūpāḥ svato 'cetanā ātmanastadupakaraṇāni cāṇūni manāṃsyacetanāni /
GSP33brssbh2u:3732: tatrātmadravyāṇāṃ manodravyāṇāṃ ca saṃyogānnavecchādayo vaiśeṣikā ātmaguṇā utpadyante /
GSP33brssbh2u:3733: te cāvyatirekeṇa pratyekamātmasu samavayanti sa saṃsāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3735: tatra sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvaccaitanyasvarūpatvātsarvātmanāṃ saṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāccaikasya sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhe sarveṣāṃ sukhaduḥkhasaṃbandhaḥ prāpnoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3743: asatyāṃ punarupapattau kāmaṃ mā bhūdabhilaṣitaṃ puruṣakaivalyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3745: kāṇādānāmapi yadaikenātmanā manaḥ saṃyujyate tadātmāntarairapi nāntarīyakaḥ saṃyogaḥ syātsaṃnidhānādyaviśeṣāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3746: tataśca hetvaviśeṣātphalāviśeṣa ityekasyātmanaḥ sukhaduḥkhayoge sarvātmanāmapi samānaṃ sukhaduḥkhitvaṃ prasajyeta // 50 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3753: sāṃkhyānāṃ tāvattadanātmasamavāyi pradhānavarti pradhānasādhāraṇyānna pratyātmaṃ sukhaduḥkhopabhogasya niyāmakamupapadyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3754: kāṇādānāmapi pūrvavatsādhāraṇenātmamanaḥsaṃyogena nirvartitasyādṛṣṭasyāpyasyaivātmana idamadṛṣṭamiti niyame hetvabhāvādeṣa eva doṣaḥ // 51 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3756: ahamidaṃ phalaṃ prāpnavānīdaṃ pariharāṇītthaṃ prayatā itthaṃ karavāṇītyevaṃvidhā abhisaṃdhyādayaḥ pratyātmaṃ pravartamānā adṛṣṭasyātmanāṃ ca svasvāmibhāvaṃ niyaṃsyantīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3760: abhisaṃdhyādīnāmapi sādhāraṇenaivātmamanaḥsaṃyogena sarvātmasaṃnidhau kriyamāṇānāṃ niyamahetutvānupapatteruktadoṣānuṣaṅga eva // 52 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3763_0: athocyeta vibhutve 'pyatmanaḥ śarīrapratiṣṭhena manasā saṃyogaḥ śarīrāvacchinna evātmapradeśe
GSP33brssbh2u:3763_1: bhaviṣyatīti ataḥ pradeśakṛtā vyavasthābhisaṃdhyādīnāmadṛṣṭasya sukhaduḥkhayośca bhaviṣyatīti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3768: tatra na vaiśeṣikaiḥ śarīrāvacchinno 'pyātmānaḥ pradeśaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3769: kalpyamāno 'pyayaṃ niṣpradeśasyātmanaḥ pradeśaḥ kālpanikatvādeva na pāramārthikaṃ kāryaṃ niyantuṃ śaknoti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3770: śarīramapi sarvātmasaṃnidhāvutpadyamānamasyaivātmano netareṣāmiti na niyantuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3771: pradeśaviśeṣābhyupagame 'pi ca dvayorātmanoḥ samānasukhaduḥkhabhājoḥ kadācidekenaiva tāvaccharīreṇopabhogasiddhiḥ syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3773_1: yajñadattaśarīre ca taṃ pradeśamanuprāpte tasyāpītareṇa samānaḥ sukhaduḥkhānubhavo
GSP33brssbh2u:3773_2: dṛśyate sa na syādyadi devadattayajñadattayoḥ samānapradeśamaniṣṭaṃ na syāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3787: iti śrīgovindabhagavatpūjyapādaśiṣyaśrīmacchaṅkarabhagavatpūjyapādakṛtau śrīśārīrakamīmāṃsābhāṣye dvitīyādhyāyasya tṛtīyaḥ pādaḥ samāptaḥ // 3 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3797: iti caivamādiṣūtpattiprakaraṇeṣu prāṇānāmutpajirnāmnāyate kvaciccānutpattirevaiṣāmāmnāyate 'asadvā idamagra āsīt' (tai. 2.7)
GSP33brssbh2u:3800: prāṇā vāva ṛṣayaḥ' ityatra prāgutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvaśravaṇāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3801: anyatra tu prāṇānāmapyutpattiḥ paṭhyate- 'yathāgnerjvalataḥ kṣudrā visphuliṅgā vyuccarantyevamevaitasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ' iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:3804: iti, 'sa prāṇamasṛjata prāṇācchraddhāṃ khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivīndriyaṃ mano 'nnam' (pra. 6.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:3822: atra prāṇotpattivādivākyajātamujadāharaṇam- 'etasmādātmanaḥ sarve prāṇāḥ sarve lokāḥ sarve devāḥ sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' (bṛ. 2.1.20) ityevañjātīyakam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3823: tatra yathā lokādayaḥ parasmādbrahmaṇa utpadyante tathā prāṇā apītyarthaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3824: tathā- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇo manaḥ sarvendriyāṇi ca khaṃ vāyurjyotirāpaḥ pṛthivī viśvasya dhāriṇī' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:3827: yathātītānantarapādādyuktā viyadādayaḥ parasya brahmaṇo vikārāḥ samadhigatāstathā prāṇā api parasya brahmaṇo vikārā iti yojayitavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3830: nanu keṣucitpradeśeṣu na prāṇānāmutpattiḥ śrūyata ityuktaṃ tadayuktam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3837: yathā tṛtīyādhyaye caturthapādeṣvapratigraheṣvadhikaraṇapūrvapakṣanyāyo bahusūtravyavahito 'pi somavamane parāmṛśyate tadvadatrāpi jñeyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3846: iti hyekavijñānena sarvavijñānaṃ pratijñāya tatsādhanāyedamāmnāyate- 'etasmājjāyate prāṇaḥ' (muṇḍa. 2.1.3) ityādi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3847: sā ca pratijñā prāṇādeḥ samastasya jāgato brahmavikāratve sati prakṛtivyatirekeṇa vikārābhāvātsiddhyati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3849: tathāca pratijñātārthamupasaṃharati- 'puruṣa evedaṃ viśvaṃ karma tapo brahma parāmṛtam' (muṇḍa. 2.2.11)
GSP33brssbh2u:3851: tathā 'ātmano vā are darśanena śravaṇena matyā vijñānenedaṃ sarvaṃ viditam' ityevañjātīyakāsu śrutiṣveṣaiva pratijñā yojayitavyā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3856: avāntaraprakṛtiviṣayaṃ tvetatsvavavikārāpekṣaṃ pragutpatteḥ prāṇānāṃ sadbhāvāvadhāraṇamiti draṣṭavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3858: viyadadhikaraṇe hi 'gauṇyasaṃbhavāt' iti pūrvapakṣasūtratvādgauṇī janmaśrutirasaṃbhavāditi vyākhyātam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3861: tadanurodena tvihāpi gauṇī janmaśrutisaṃbhavāditi vyācakṣāṇaiḥ pratijñāhānirupekṣitā syāt // 2 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3865: yajjāyata ityekaṃ janmavācipadaṃ prāṇeṣu prākśrutaṃ saduttareṣvapyākāśādiṣvanuvartate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3867: ityatrākāśādiṣu mukhyaṃ janmeti pratiṣṭhāpitaṃ tatsāmānyātprāṇeṣvapi mukhyameva janma bhavitumarhati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3868: nahyekasminprakaraṇa ekasmiṃśca vākya ekaḥ śabdaḥ sakṛduccarito bahubhiḥ saṃbadhyamānaḥ kvacinmukhyaḥ kvacidgauṇa ityadhyavasātuṃ śakyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3871: ityatrāpi prāṇeṣu śrutaḥ sṛjatiḥ pareṣvapyutpattimatsu śraddhādiṣvanuṣajyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3872: yatrāpi paścacchruta utpattivacanaḥ śabdaḥ pūrvaiḥ saṃbadhyate tatrāpyeṣa eva nyāyaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3873: yathā 'sarvāṇi bhūtāni vyuccaranti' ityayamante paṭhito vyuccarantiśabdaḥ pūrvairapi prāṇādibhiḥ saṃbadhyate // 3 //
GSP33brssbh2u:3879: tathāpi brahmaprakṛtikatejobannapīrvakatvābhidhānādvākprāṇamanasāṃ tatsāmānyācca sarveṣāmeva prāṇānāṃ brahmaprabhavatvaṃ siddhaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3880: tathāhi- asminneva prakaraṇe tejobannapūrvakatvaṃ vākprāṇamanasāmāmnāyate- 'annamayaṃ hi somya mana āpomayaḥ prāṇastejomayī vāk' (chā. 6.5.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3881: tatra yadi tāvanmukhyamevaiṣāmannādimayatvaṃ tato vartata eva brahmaprabhavatvam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3882: atha bhāktaṃ tatāpi brahmakartṛkāyāṃ nāmarūpavyākriyāyāṃ śravaṇāt 'yenāśrutaṃ śrutaṃ bhavati' (chā. 6.1.3)
GSP33brssbh2u:3892: saṃprati tu katītare prāṇā iti saṃpradhārayati /
GSP33brssbh2u:3894: kvacitsapta prāṇāḥ saṃkīrtyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3895: kvaciccāṣṭau prāṇā grahatvena guṇena saṃkīrtyante- ' aṣṭau grahā aṣṭāvatigrahāḥ'' (bṛ. 3.2.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3896: kvacinnava- 'sapta vai śīrṣaṇyāḥ prāṇā dvāvavāñcau' (tai. saṃ. 5.1.7.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3897: kvaciddaśa- 'nava vai puruṣe prāṇā nābhirdaśamī' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3901: evaṃ hi vipratipannāḥ prāṇeyattāṃ prati śrutayaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3905: yatastāvanto 'vagamyante- 'sapta prāṇāḥ prabhavanti tasmāt' (muṇḍa. 2.1.8) ityevaṃvidhāsu śrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:3910: puruṣabhedābhiprāyeyaṃ vīpsā pratipuruṣaṃ sapta sapta prāṇā iti,
GSP33brssbh2u:3911: na tattvabhedābhiprāyā sapta saptānye 'nye prāṇā iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3912: nanvaṣṭatvādikāpi saṃkhāyā prāṇeṣūdāhṛtā kathaṃ saptaiva syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3927: hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ śrūyante- 'hastau vai grahaḥ sa karmaṇātigraheṇa gṛhīto hastābhyāṃ hi karma karoti' (bṛ. 3.2.8)
GSP33brssbh2u:3930: hīnādhikasaṃkhyāvipratipattau hyadhikā saṃkhyā saṃgrāhyā bhavati tasyāṃ hīnāntarbhavati natu hīnāyāmadhikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:3931: ataśca naivaṃ mantavyaṃ stokakalpanānurodhātsaptaiva prāṇāḥ syuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3933: tathā codāhṛtā śrutiḥ - 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaḥ' (bṛ. 3.9.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3937: nanvekādaśābhyaḥ kāryajātebhyo 'dhikaṃ kāryajātamasti yadarthamadhikaṃ karaṇaṃ kalpyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:3939: vacanādānaviharaṇotsargānandāḥ pañca karmabhedāstadarthāni ca pañca karmendriyāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:3941: tadeva vṛttibhedāt kvacidbhinnavadvyapadiśyate- 'mano buddhiraṅaṃkāraścittaṃ ca' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3942: tathāca śrutiḥ kāmādyā nānāvidhā vṛttiranukramyāha- 'etatsarvaṃ mana eva' (bṛ. 1.5.3) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3943: apica saptaiva śīrṣaṇyānprāṇānabhimanyamānasya catvāra eva prāṇā abhimatāḥ syuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3944: sthānabhedāddhyete catvāraḥ santaḥ sapta gaṇyante 'dve śrotre dve cakṣuṣī dve nāsike ekā vāk' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3945: naca tāvatāmeva vṛttibhedā itare prāṇā iti śakyate vaktuṃ, hastādivṛttīnāmatyantavijātīyatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:3947: ityatrāpi dehacchidrabhedābhiprāyeṇaiva daśa prāṇā ucyante na prāṇatattvabhedābhiprāyeṇa /
GSP33brssbh2u:3950: mukhyasya tu prāṇasya bhavati nābhirapyekaṃ viśeṣāyatanamityato nābhirdaśamītyucyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3952: tadevaṃ vicitre prāṇeyattāmnāne sati kva kiṃparamāmnānamiti vivektavyam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3955: saptaiva prāṇāḥ syuryataḥ saptānāmeva gatiḥ śrūyate- 'tamutkrāmantaṃ prāṇo 'nūtkrāmantaṃ sarve prāṇā anūtkrāmanti' (bṛ. 4.4.2) ityatra /
GSP33brssbh2u:3956: nanu sarvaśabdo 'pyatra paṭhyate, tatkathaṃ saptanāmeva gatiḥ pratijñāyata iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3958: saptaiva hi prāṇāścakṣurādayastvakparyantā viśeṣitā iha prakṛtāḥ 'sa yatraiva cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣaḥ parāṅparyāvartate 'thārūpajño bhavati' (bṛ. 4.4.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:3961: prakṛtagāmī ca sarvaśabdo bhavati yathā sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā iti ye nimantritāḥ prakṛtā brāhmaṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānye /
GSP33brssbh2u:3962: evamihāpi ye prakṛtāḥ sapta prāṇāsta eva sarvaśabdenocyante nānya iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3967: evaṃprāpte brūmaḥ - hastādayastvapare saptabhyo 'tiriktāḥ prāṇāḥ pratīyante-' hastau vai grahaḥ' (bṛ. 3.2.8) ityādiśrutiṣu /
GSP33brssbh2u:3968: grahatvaṃ ca bandhanabhāvo gṛhyate,badhyate kṣetrajño 'nena grahasaṃjñakena bandhaneneti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3969: sa ca kṣetrajño naikasminneva śarīre badhyate, śarīrāntareṣvi tulyatvādbandhanasya /
GSP33brssbh2u:3971: tathāca smṛtiḥ - puryaṣṭakena liṅgena prāṇādyena sa yujyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:3972: tena baddhasya vai bandho mokṣo muktasya tena ca /
GSP33brssbh2u:3974_0: ātharvaṇe ca viṣayendriyānukramaṇe cakṣuṣa draṣṭavyaṃ ca ityatra tulyavaddhastādīnīndriyāṇi
GSP33brssbh2u:3974_1: saviṣayāṇyanukrāmati-' hastau cādātavyaṃ copasthaścānandayitavyaṃ ca pāyuśca visarjayitavyaṃ
GSP33brssbh2u:3974_2: ca pādau ca gantavyaṃ ca' ( pra. 4.8) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:3975: tathā 'daśeme puruṣe prāṇā ātmaikādaśaste yadāsmāccharīrānmartyādutkrāmantyatha rodayanti' (bṛ. 3.9.4)
GSP33brssbh2u:3978: sarvaśabdo 'pi ca prāṇaśabdena saṃbadhyamāno 'śeṣānprāṇānabhidadhāno na prakaraṇavaśena saptasvevāvasthāpayituṃ śakyate,
GSP33brssbh2u:3980: sarve brāhmaṇā bhojayitavyā ityatrāpi sarveṣāmevāvanivartināṃ brāhmaṇānāṃ grahaṇaṃ nyāyyaṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:3988: FN: guhāyāṃ hṛdaye śerata iti guhāśayāḥ svastāneṣu nihitāḥ nikṣiptāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:3993: prāṇādipañcakaṃ bhūtasūkṣmapañcakaṃ jñānendriyapañcakaṃ karmendriyapañcakaṃ antaḥkaraṇacatuṣṭayaṃ avidyā kāmaḥ karma ceti paryuṣṭakam /
GSP33brssbh2u:3999: aṇutvaṃ caiṣāṃ saukṣmyaparicchedau na paramāṇutulyatvaṃ, kṛtsnadehavyāpikāryānupapattiprasaṅgāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4000: sūkṣmā ete prāṇāḥ sthūlāścetsyurmaraṇakāle śarīrānnirgacchanto bilādahirivopalabhyeranmriyamāṇasya pārśvasthaiḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4005: yadeva hyupalabdhisādhanaṃ vṛttiranyadvā tasyaiva naḥ karaṇatvaṃ saṃjñāmātre vivāda iti karaṇānāṃ vyāpitvakalpanā nirarthikā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4020: nāsadāsīye hi brahmapradhāne sūkte mantravarṇo bhavati 'na mṛtyurāsīdamṛtaṃ na tarhi na rātryā ahnu āsītpraketaḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4021: ānīdavātaṃ svadhayā tadekaṃ tasmāddhānyanna paraḥ kiñcanāsa' (ṛ.saṃ. 8.7.17) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4027: 'aprāṇo hyamanāḥ śubhraḥ' iti ca mulaprakṛteḥ prāṇādisamastaviśeṣarahitatvasya darśitatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4029: śreṣṭha iti ca mukhyaṃ prāṇamabhidadhāti- 'prāṇo vāva jyeṣṭhaśca śreṣṭhaśca' (chā. 5.1.1)
GSP33brssbh2u:4032: na cetasya tadānīṃ vṛttilābhaḥ syādyonau niṣiktaṃ śukraṃ pūyeta na saṃbhavedvā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4034: śreṣṭhaśca prāṇo guṇādhikyāt, 'na vai śakṣyāmastvadṛte jīvitum' (bṛ. 6.1.13) iti śruteḥ // 8 //
GSP33brssbh2u:4036: FN: tarhi tadā pralayakāle mṛtyurmārako mṛtyumatkāryaṃ vā nāsīt,
GSP33brssbh2u:4038: rātryāḥ praketaścihnarūpaścandraḥ ahaḥ praketaḥ sūryaśca nāstāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4044: sa punarmukhyaḥ prāṇaḥ kiṃsvarūpa itīdānīṃ jijñāsyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4046: evaṃ hi śrūyate- 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ sa eṣa vāyuḥ pañcavidhaḥ prāṇo 'pāno vyāna udānaḥ samānaḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4048: evaṃ hi tantrāntarīyā ācakṣate- 'sāmānyā karaṇavṛttiḥ prāṇādyā vāyavaḥ pañce' ti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4049: atrocyate- na vāyuḥ prāṇo nāpi karaṇavyāpāraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4051: vāyostāvatprāṇasya pṛthagupadeśo bhavati- 'prāṇa eva brahmaṇaścaścaturthaḥ pādaḥ sa vāyunā jyotiṣā bhāti ca tapati ca' (chāndo. 3.18.4) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4056: nahi karaṇavyāpāra eva san karaṇebhyaḥ pṛthagupadiśyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:4058: khaṃ vāyuḥ' (mu. 2.1.3) ityevamādayo 'pi vāyoḥ karaṇebhyaśca prāṇasya pṛthagupadeśā anusartavyāḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4059: naca samastānāṃ karaṇānāmekā vṛttiḥ saṃbhavati, pratyekamekaikavṛttitvātsamudāyasya cākārakatvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4061: yathaitapañjaravartina ekādaśapakṣiṇaḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavyāpārāḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayanti,
GSP33brssbh2u:4062: evamekaśarīravartina ekādaśa prāṇāḥ pratyekaṃ pratiniyatavṛttayaḥ santaḥ saṃbhūyaikāṃ prāṇākhyāṃ vṛttiṃ pratilapsyanta iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4064: yuktaṃ tatra pratyekavṛttibhiravāntaravyāpāraiḥ pañjaracālanānurūpairevopetāḥ pakṣiṇaḥ saṃbhūyaikaṃ pañjaraṃ cālayeyuriti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4066: iha tu śravaṇādyavāntaravyāpāropetāḥ prāṇa na saṃbhūya prāṇyuriti yuktam, pramāṇābhāvāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4068: tathā prāṇasya śreṣṭhatvādyudghoṣaṇaṃ guṇabhāvopagamaśca taṃ prati vāgādīnāṃ,
GSP33brssbh2u:4071: kathaṃ tarhīyaṃ śrutiḥ 'yaḥ prāṇaḥ sa vāyuḥ' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4072: ucyate- vāyurevāyamadhyātmamāpannaḥ pañcavyūho viśeṣātmanāvatiṣṭhamānaḥ prāṇo nāma bhaṇyate na tattvāntaraṃ nāpi vāyumātram /
GSP33brssbh2u:4077_0: tathāhyanekavidhā vibhūtiḥ prāṇasya śrāvyate- 'supteṣu vāgādiṣu prāṇa eko hi jāgarti
GSP33brssbh2u:4077_1: prāṇa eko mṛtyunānāptaḥ prāṇaḥ saṃvargo vāgādīnsaṃvṛṅ kte prāṇa itarānprāṇānrakṣati
GSP33brssbh2u:4083: yathā cakṣurādīni rājaprakṛtivajjīvasya kartṛtvaṃ bhoktṛtvaṃ ca pratyupakaraṇāni na svatantrāṇi /
GSP33brssbh2u:4084: tathā mukhyo 'pi prāṇo rājamantrivajjīvasya sarvārthakaratvenopakaraṇabhūto na svatantraḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4088: samānadharmāṇāṃ ca saha śāsanaṃ yuktaṃ bṛhadrathantarādivat /
GSP33brssbh2u:4091: yadi cakṣurādivatprāṇasya jīvaṃ prati karaṇabhāvo 'bhāyupagamyeta,viṣayāntaraṃ rūpādivatprasajyeta /

GSP33brssbh2u:4152_0: te punaḥ prakṛtāḥ prāṇāḥ kiṃ svamahimnaiva svasmai kāryāya prabhavantyāhosviddevatādhiṣṭhitāḥ
GSP33brssbh2u:4152_1: prabhavantīti vicāryate- tatra prāptaṃ tāvadyathā svakāryaśaktiyogātsvamahimnaiva
GSP33brssbh2u:4153: apica devatādhiṣṭhitānāṃ prāṇānāṃ pravṛttāvabhyupagamyamānāyāṃ tāsāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ devatānāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgāccharīrasya bhoktṛtvaṃ pralīyeta /
GSP33brssbh2u:4155: evaṃ prāptaṃ idamucyate- jyotirādyadhiṣṭhānaṃ tu iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4157: jyotirādibhiragnyādyabhimāninībhirdevatābhiradhiṣṭhitaṃ vāgādi karaṇajātaṃ svakāryeṣu pravartata iti pratijānīte /
GSP33brssbh2u:4161: nahi devatāsaṃbandhaṃ pratyākhyāyāgnervāci mukhe vā kaścidviśeṣasaṃbandho dṛśyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4162: tathā 'vāyuḥ prāṇo bhūtvā nāsike prāviśat' (aita. 2.4) ityevamādyapi yaujayitavyam /

GSP33brssbh2u:4165: 'sa vai vācameva prathamāmatyavahatsā yadā mṛtyumatyamucyata so 'gnirabhavat' (bṛ. 1.3.12)

GSP33brssbh2u:4180: yadapyuktaṃ devatānāmevādhiṣṭhātrīṇāṃ bhoktṛtvaprasaṅgo na śārīrasyeti tatparihriyate-
GSP33brssbh2u:4182: satīṣvapi prāṇānāmadhiṣṭātrīṣu devatāsu prāṇavatā kāryakaraṇasaṃghātasvāminā śārīreṇaivaiṣāṃ prāṇānāṃ saṃbandhaḥ śruteravagamyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4183: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'atha yatraitadākāśamanuviṣaṇṇaṃ cakṣuḥ sa cākṣuṣaḥ puruṣo darśanāya takṣuratha yo vededaṃ jighrāṇīti sa ātmā gandhāya ghrāṇam' (chā. 8.124)
GSP33brssbh2u:4189: atha dehe prāgapraveśānantaraṃ yatra golake etacchidramanupraviṣṭaṃ cakṣurindriyaṃ tatra cakṣuṣyabhimānī sa ātmā cākṣuṣaḥ tasya rūpadarśanāya cakṣuḥ /
GSP33brssbh2u:4192: tasya ca śārīrasyāsmiñśarīre bhoktṛtvena nityatvena puṇyapāpopalepasaṃbhavātsukhaduḥkhopabhogasaṃbhavācca na devatānām /
GSP33brssbh2u:4193: tā hi parasminnaiśvarye pade 'vatiṣṭhamānā na hine 'smiñśarīre bhoktṛtvaṃ pratilabdhumarhanti /

GSP33brssbh2u:4272: apica ḍitthaḍavitthādiṣu nāmasu ghaṭaśarāvādiṣu ca rūpeṣu jīvasyaiva vyākartṛtvaṃ dṛṣṭam /
GSP33brssbh2u:4277: trivṛtkurvata iti parameśvaraṃ lakṣayati, trivṛtkaraṇe tasya nirapavādakartṛtvanirdeśāt /
GSP33brssbh2u:4279: tathā kuśakāśapalāśādiṣu paśumṛgamanuṣyādiṣu ca pratyākṛti prativyakti cānekaprakārā /

GSP33brssbh2u:4288: yeṣvapi cāsti sāmarthyaṃ teṣvapi parameśvarāyattameva tat /

GSP33brssbh2u:4297: tacca trivṛtkaraṇamagnyādityacandravidyutsu śrutirdarśayati- 'yadagre rohitaṃ rūpaṃ tejasastadrūpaṃ yacchuklaṃ tadapāṃ yatkṛṣṇaṃ tadannasya' (chā. 6.4.1) ityādinā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4299: sati ca rūpavyākaraṇe viṣayapratilambhādagniritīdaṃ nāma vyākriyate /
GSP33brssbh2u:4301: anena cāgnyādyudāharaṇena bhaumāmbhasataijaseṣu triṣvapi dravyeṣvaviśeṣeṇa trivṛtkaraṇamuktaṃ bhavati /
GSP33brssbh2u:4304: aviśeṣeṇaiva copasaṃhāraḥ - 'yadu rohitamivābhūditi tejasastadrūpam' ityevamādiḥ 'yadavijñātamivābhūdityetāsāmeva devatānāṃ samāsa iti' (chā. 6.4.6.7) evamantaḥ // 20 //
GSP33brssbh2u:4307: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāmekaikāṃ devatāṃ tejobannātmanā tryātmikāṃ kariṣyāmīti śrutiḥ pañcīkaraṇopalakṣaṇārthā /
GSP33brssbh2u:4309: tāsāṃ tisṛṇāṃ devatānāṃ bahistrivṛtkṛtānāṃ satīnāmadhyātmamaparaṃ trivṛtkaraṇamuktam- 'imāstisro devatāḥ puruṣaṃ prāpya trivṛttrivṛdekaikā bhavati' (chā. 6.4.7) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4313: tathāhi śrutiḥ - 'annamaśitaṃ tredhā vidhīyate tasya yaḥ sthaviṣṭho dhātustatpurīṣaṃ bhavati yo madhyamastanmāṃsaṃ yo 'ṇiṣṭhastanmanaḥ' (chā. 6.5.1) iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4321: atrāha- yadi sarvameva trivṛtkṛtaṃ bhūtabhautikamaviśeṣaśruteḥ 'tāsa trivṛtaṃ trivṛtamekaikāmakarot' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4322: kiṅkṛtastarhyayaṃ viśeṣavyapadeśaḥ 'idaṃ teja imā āpa idamannam' iti /
GSP33brssbh2u:4334: vyavahāraśca trivṛtkṛtarajjuvadekatvāpattau satyāṃ na bhedena bhūtatrayagocaro lokasya prasiddhyet /
GSP33brssbh2u:4335: tasmātsatyapi trivṛtkaraṇe vaiśeṣyādeva tejobannaviśeṣavādo bhūtabhautikaviṣaya upapadyate /
